description: seated man in a crown surrounded by a large elliptical brim holds a large green club that points downward in his raised right hand; ROY DE BASTON printed on bottom border; from a deck of 78 hand-colored triumph playing cards
provenance:
'Lady Charlotte Elizabeth Schrieber, 1812-1895, London [1]. Carl A. Weyerhaeuser, Minneapolis (by 1937); given to MIA, 1996.

1. Note with deck states: "Swiss Tarot. / Complete 78 Cards / from Schreiber Collection"
title: King of Batons
